name: Keep It Steady!
description:
Try to get the ball in the lit hole while avoiding the unlit holes by tilting a paddle.

See how high of a score you can get in 3 minutes of playing Keep It Steady!

In this retro style game you will be able to control the left and right sides of a long paddle. You must move these sides up and down to guide the ball and to carefully balance and roll it into the lit up yellow hole while simultaneously avoiding the black unlit holes. Be careful to not accidently roll the ball into the wrong holes or it will be game over!

This game also includes a online scoreboard so you can play to try to take the chance at being the best player in the world!
